text:
"Godzilla vs. Kong" is an upcoming 2021 American action-adventure science fiction monster movie directed by Adam Wingard. It is a sequel to ' (2019) and ' (2017). It is the fourth movie in Legendary's MonsterVerse.
The movie is also the 37th movie in the "Godzilla" franchise, the 12th movie in the "King Kong" franchise, and the fourth "Godzilla" movie to be completely produced by a Hollywood studio.
The movie stars Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall,Brian Tyree Henry, Shun Oguri, Eiza González, Jessica Henwick, Julian Dennison, Kyle Chandler, and Demián Bichir.
"Godzilla vs. Kong" is scheduled to be released on March 26, 2021, in 2D, 3D, and IMAX later on HBO Max.
